body:
Comment 1: 
One-line structs intentionally don't have a blank after the "struct" keyword; for
instance:

type T struct{} // similar to interface{}

struct{x, y int}{ {1, 2}, {3, 4} }

look better w/o the blank (it's clear that the struct and the { belong together).

Multi-line structs have a blank after the keyword.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
